Lists Implemented Distributions

Source: R/listDistributions.R
listDistributions.Rd

Lists distr6 distributions in a data.table or a character vector, can be filtered by traits and implemented package.

listDistributions(simplify = FALSE, filter = NULL)

Arguments

simplify

logical. If FALSE (default) returns distributions with traits as a data.table, otherwise returns distribution names as characters.
filter

list to filter distributions by. See examples.

Value

Either a list of characters (if simplify is TRUE) or a data.table of SDistributions and their traits.

See also

SDistribution

Examples

listDistributions()
#>     ShortName          ClassName ValueSupport  VariateForm    Package
#>  1:       Arc            Arcsine   continuous   univariate     distr6
#>  2:      Bern          Bernoulli     discrete   univariate      stats
#>  3:      Beta               Beta   continuous   univariate      stats
#>  4:     Binom           Binomial     discrete   univariate      stats
#>  5:       Cat        Categorical     discrete   univariate     distr6
#>  6:    Cauchy             Cauchy   continuous   univariate      stats
#>  7:     ChiSq         ChiSquared   continuous   univariate      stats
#>  8:     Degen         Degenerate   continuous   univariate     distr6
#>  9:      Diri          Dirichlet   continuous multivariate     distr6
#> 10:     DUnif    DiscreteUniform     discrete   univariate     distr6
#> 11:       Exp        Exponential   continuous   univariate      stats
#> 12:         F      FDistribution   continuous   univariate      stats
#> 13:      Frec            Frechet   continuous   univariate     distr6
#> 14:     Gamma              Gamma   continuous   univariate      stats
#> 15:      Geom          Geometric     discrete   univariate      stats
#> 16:      Gomp           Gompertz   continuous   univariate     distr6
#> 17:      Gumb             Gumbel   continuous   univariate     distr6
#> 18: Hypergeom     Hypergeometric     discrete   univariate      stats
#> 19:    invgam       InverseGamma   continuous   univariate extraDistr
#> 20:       Lap            Laplace   continuous   univariate     distr6
#> 21:       Log        Logarithmic     discrete   univariate extraDistr
#> 22:     Logis           Logistic   continuous   univariate      stats
#> 23:    LLogis        Loglogistic   continuous   univariate     distr6
#> 24: Lognormal          Lognormal   continuous   univariate      stats
#> 25:  Multinom        Multinomial     discrete multivariate      stats
#> 26: MultiNorm MultivariateNormal   continuous multivariate     distr6
#> 27:    NBinom   NegativeBinomial     discrete   univariate     distr6
#> 28:      Norm             Normal   continuous   univariate      stats
#> 29:      Pare             Pareto   continuous   univariate     distr6
#> 30:      Pois            Poisson     discrete   univariate      stats
#> 31:      Rayl           Rayleigh   continuous   univariate     distr6
#> 32:         T           StudentT   continuous   univariate      stats
#> 33:       Tri         Triangular   continuous   univariate     distr6
#> 34:      Unif            Uniform   continuous   univariate      stats
#> 35:      Wald               Wald   continuous   univariate     distr6
#> 36:   Weibull            Weibull   continuous   univariate      stats
#>     ShortName          ClassName ValueSupport  VariateForm    Package

# Filter list
listDistributions(filter = list(VariateForm = "univariate"))
#>     ShortName        ClassName ValueSupport VariateForm    Package
#>  1:       Arc          Arcsine   continuous  univariate     distr6
#>  2:      Bern        Bernoulli     discrete  univariate      stats
#>  3:      Beta             Beta   continuous  univariate      stats
#>  4:     Binom         Binomial     discrete  univariate      stats
#>  5:       Cat      Categorical     discrete  univariate     distr6
#>  6:    Cauchy           Cauchy   continuous  univariate      stats
#>  7:     ChiSq       ChiSquared   continuous  univariate      stats
#>  8:     Degen       Degenerate   continuous  univariate     distr6
#>  9:     DUnif  DiscreteUniform     discrete  univariate     distr6
#> 10:       Exp      Exponential   continuous  univariate      stats
#> 11:         F    FDistribution   continuous  univariate      stats
#> 12:      Frec          Frechet   continuous  univariate     distr6
#> 13:     Gamma            Gamma   continuous  univariate      stats
#> 14:      Geom        Geometric     discrete  univariate      stats
#> 15:      Gomp         Gompertz   continuous  univariate     distr6
#> 16:      Gumb           Gumbel   continuous  univariate     distr6
#> 17: Hypergeom   Hypergeometric     discrete  univariate      stats
#> 18:    invgam     InverseGamma   continuous  univariate extraDistr
#> 19:       Lap          Laplace   continuous  univariate     distr6
#> 20:       Log      Logarithmic     discrete  univariate extraDistr
#> 21:     Logis         Logistic   continuous  univariate      stats
#> 22:    LLogis      Loglogistic   continuous  univariate     distr6
#> 23: Lognormal        Lognormal   continuous  univariate      stats
#> 24:    NBinom NegativeBinomial     discrete  univariate     distr6
#> 25:      Norm           Normal   continuous  univariate      stats
#> 26:      Pare           Pareto   continuous  univariate     distr6
#> 27:      Pois          Poisson     discrete  univariate      stats
#> 28:      Rayl         Rayleigh   continuous  univariate     distr6
#> 29:         T         StudentT   continuous  univariate      stats
#> 30:       Tri       Triangular   continuous  univariate     distr6
#> 31:      Unif          Uniform   continuous  univariate      stats
#> 32:      Wald             Wald   continuous  univariate     distr6
#> 33:   Weibull          Weibull   continuous  univariate      stats
#>     ShortName        ClassName ValueSupport VariateForm    Package

# Filter is case-insensitive
listDistributions(filter = list(VaLuESupport = "discrete"))
#>     ShortName        ClassName ValueSupport  VariateForm    Package
#>  1:      Bern        Bernoulli     discrete   univariate      stats
#>  2:     Binom         Binomial     discrete   univariate      stats
#>  3:       Cat      Categorical     discrete   univariate     distr6
#>  4:     DUnif  DiscreteUniform     discrete   univariate     distr6
#>  5:      Geom        Geometric     discrete   univariate      stats
#>  6: Hypergeom   Hypergeometric     discrete   univariate      stats
#>  7:       Log      Logarithmic     discrete   univariate extraDistr
#>  8:  Multinom      Multinomial     discrete multivariate      stats
#>  9:    NBinom NegativeBinomial     discrete   univariate     distr6
#> 10:      Pois          Poisson     discrete   univariate      stats

# Multiple filters
listDistributions(filter = list(VaLuESupport = "discrete", package = "distr6"))
#>    ShortName        ClassName ValueSupport VariateForm Package
#> 1:       Cat      Categorical     discrete  univariate  distr6
#> 2:     DUnif  DiscreteUniform     discrete  univariate  distr6
#> 3:    NBinom NegativeBinomial     discrete  univariate  distr6
